abstract: Nortel Networks, the bankrupt communications equipment maker, won court permission to sell its telephone-service unit to Avaya.
snippet: Nortel Networks, the bankrupt communications equipment maker, won court permission to sell its telephone-service unit to Avaya.
lead_paragraph: Nortel Networks, the bankrupt communications equipment maker, won court permission today to sell its telephone-service unit to Avaya, undermining a move by Verizon Communications to block the deal.

headline.main: In Blow to Verizon, Nortel Gets Approval for Avaya Deal

abstract: Ivan Seidenberg tells Wall Street that he is no longer worried about customers canceling traditional landlines. With its new fiber optic lines, Verizon will focus on selling video.
snippet: Ivan Seidenberg tells Wall Street that he is no longer worried about customers canceling traditional landlines. With its new fiber optic lines, Verizon will focus on selling video.
lead_paragraph: Roll over in your grave, Alexander Graham Bell.

headline.main: Verizon Boss Hangs Up on Landline Phone Business
